KYC & Verification.question: Do I need to use the mobile number linked to my Aadhaar?
KYC & Verification.answer: Yes—you must use the mobile number registered with your Aadhaar card to open and verify your Jupiter account.

KYC & Verification.question: How do I troubleshoot mobile number verification failures?
KYC & Verification.answer: Ensure your device has the correct SIM inserted and that your SMS plan is active. Then restart the in-app verification flow from where you left off.

KYC & Verification.question: How can I update my registered mobile number if I’ve lost the old one?
KYC & Verification.answer: Go to Settings → Profile → Mobile Number, enter the new number (must be Aadhaar-linked), and complete OTP verification.

KYC & Verification.question: What documents are required for KYC on Jupiter?
KYC & Verification.answer: You need a photo of your Aadhaar card (front + back) and a selfie for liveness check. In some cases, your PAN card may also be requested.

KYC & Verification.question: How long does KYC verification take?
KYC & Verification.answer: eKYC via Aadhaar OTP is usually instant (under 2 minutes). Manual document KYC can take up to 24 hours.

Rewards & Offers.question: How do I earn Jupiter reward points?
Rewards & Offers.answer: You earn points on eligible transactions (e.g., bill payments, UPI transfers) at a rate of up to 2 points per ₹100 spent. Check the Rewards tab for ongoing offers.

Rewards & Offers.question: How can I redeem my Jupiter reward points?
Rewards & Offers.answer: Go to Rewards → Redeem, choose from gift cards, cashback, or partner vouchers. Minimum redemption is 500 points.

Rewards & Offers.question: Do my Jupiter reward points expire?
Rewards & Offers.answer: Yes—points expire 12 months from the date they are earned. You’ll see expiry dates in the Rewards section.

Rewards & Offers.question: Are there special offers for new users?
Rewards & Offers.answer: New users often get a welcome bonus (e.g., 200 points) after first account credit of ₹500 or more, valid for 30 days.

Payments & Transfers.question: What are the limits for UPI transactions?
Payments & Transfers.answer: Default UPI limit is ₹1 lakh per transaction and ₹2 lakh per day. You can request higher limits via your bank.

Payments & Transfers.question: How do I send money via UPI in Jupiter?
Payments & Transfers.answer: Open the app, tap Payments → Send, enter UPI ID or scan QR code, enter amount, and authenticate with your UPI PIN.

Payments & Transfers.question: Can I schedule recurring payments?
Payments & Transfers.answer: Yes—go to Payments → Schedule, set frequency (daily/weekly/monthly), amount, and beneficiary. Jupiter will auto-execute.

Payments & Transfers.question: Is there any fee for NEFT/RTGS transfers?
Payments & Transfers.answer: No—Jupiter does not charge for NEFT or RTGS transfers. Your bank may levy statutory charges.

Account Limits & Fees.question: What is the minimum account balance I must maintain?
Account Limits & Fees.answer: There is no minimum balance requirement on Jupiter savings accounts.

Account Limits & Fees.question: Are there ATM withdrawal fees?
Account Limits & Fees.answer: You get four free domestic ATM withdrawals per month. From the fifth onwards, a ₹20 fee applies per withdrawal.

Account Limits & Fees.question: What are the cash deposit limits?
Account Limits & Fees.answer: You can deposit up to ₹50,000 per transaction at partner ATMs. For higher amounts, use cheque deposit via Jupiter’s pickup service.

Account Limits & Fees.question: Is there a fee for physical debit card issuance?
Account Limits & Fees.answer: The first debit card is free; a ₹100 card-replacement fee applies thereafter.

Security & Support.question: How do I enable biometric login?
Security & Support.answer: Go to Settings → Security → Biometric Login, toggle it on, and authenticate via fingerprint or face.

Security & Support.question: What if I suspect unauthorized transactions?
Security & Support.answer: Immediately freeze your debit card in-app under Security → Freeze Card, then contact support via the in-app chat or helpline.

Security & Support.question: How can I reach customer support?
Security & Support.answer: Tap Help → Chat with Us in-app, or email support@jupiter.tech. Response time is typically under 4 hours.
